title: Label and Clarify UI Elements
description: Ensure all UI elements in the garage are clearly labeled and easy to understand, including bars and icons.
implementation_notes: Review the Garage Userflow diagram and ensure each UI component has tooltips or clear labels. Conduct usability testing to confirm clarity.

title: Implement Sorting Logic for Tanks
description: Develop sorting mechanisms for tanks based on ownership, type, and cost within the Garage UI.
implementation_notes: Integrate sorting algorithms into the sys_garage_ui system. Ensure sorting is visually represented and aligns with the hierarchy defined in the Table Analysis.

title: Add Decor Purchase Functionality
description: Allow players to purchase and apply decorations to their tanks using in-game currency.
implementation_notes: Design and implement a purchasing flow within sys_garage_ui. Ensure confirmation and alert boxes provide clear feedback during transactions. Test with various decoration types and currencies.
